title: Drawing, "Vulcano forging the Thunderbolts of Jove", 1811
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink:Vulcano; fabrica li fulmini per Giove.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Vulcan kneeling in right foreground, raises hammer; he holds blade with tongs. Mars and Minerva stand at left, looking on. Cupid raises one thunderbolt with his right hand and holds another with left hand.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vulcano forging the Thunderbolts of Jove", 1811.
1811. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3468.
